New Records: Jasprit Bumrah picked up two wickets in the very first over of his return to international cricket after a gap of 11 months.
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah cleaned up Andrew Balbirnie
Bumrah dished out a vicious in-swinging yorker to new-man Lorcan Tucker
Post-Match Reflections: Is it a sign of things to come? With Asia Cup and World Cup knocking on the doors, the Indian team management will certainly hope so.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The conditions were heavily in favour of swing bowling.
Bumrah, who is also leading India in this three-match T20I series becoming the first fast bowler to captain India in the shortest of the game.
Others: Jasprit Bumrah is back and how.
Bumrah was having none of it. As promised, he did not hold back and announced his return to international cricket with two wickets in his first over.
